body_html: @mojesty I'm glad to know that you found a workaround. Yes, switching to an old version works. But in the new version there is specific BC code to support load old state dict.. So could you please post those two results so I can know what is wrong? 0.4+ versions have much simpler API and many bug fixes so I want people to be able to use 0.4+ at lease.

body: @mojesty I'm glad to know that you found a workaround. Yes, switching to an old version works. But in the new version there is specific BC code to support load old state dict.. So could you please post those two results so I can know what is wrong? 0.4+ versions have much simpler API and many bug fixes so I want people to be able to use 0.4+ at lease.
